page.description: Opens the lookup Grid for a particular field.

argument.name: part
argument.description: 'G' - for a field in the Grid part, or 'D' - for a field in the Detail View part.

argument.name: rowNum
argument.description: The number of the row in the given field.

argument.name: fieldName
argument.description: The field for which the Lookup was defined. Must be uppercase.
